question.title: Count Artist Occurrences On Spotify Ranking List
question.sampleTestCase: {"headers":{"Spotify":["id","track_name","artist"]},"rows":{"Spotify":[[303651,"Heart Won't Forget","Ed Sheeran"],[1046089,"Shape of you","Sia"],[33445,"I'm the one","DJ Khalid"],[811266,"Young Dumb & Broke","DJ Khalid"],[505727,"Happier","Ed Sheeran"]]}}
